originalText.text: I give a 10. From my initial phone call to the law firm and throughout the process everyone I worked with was always professional and respectful. My team worked diligently for a fair outcome to my case, which was achieved. I give a heartfelt thank you to every member of my team and especially those I interacted with: Emily, Lisette, Maribel and Erica. Thank you all for your hard work, empathy and patience in explaining the process and taking the time to answer my questions and providing positive encouragement. You have no idea how much your respectful treatment of me and my case was a welcome blessing. Keep up the amazing work!

originalText.text: The entire staff of Markhoff & Mittman were so helpful. Juan Garcia was very professional, kind and patient with answering all of our questions. The Lawyer Daniel Eliahs was excellent! He explained everything clearly prior to the hearing and on the day of the hearing. He really showed that he genuinely cared about my mom's condition and case. Thank you again to the entire staff. You guys were amazing and such a blessing!

text.text: The entire staff of Markhoff & Mittman were so helpful. Juan Garcia was very professional, kind and patient with answering all of our questions. The Lawyer Daniel Eliahs was excellent! He explained everything clearly prior to the hearing and on the day of the hearing. He really showed that he genuinely cared about my mom's condition and case. Thank you again to the entire staff. You guys were amazing and such a blessing!

originalText.text: Atty. Benare was patient and courteous in her communication and interaction with me regarding my questions and concerns.  She explained my case complexity with terms that were easier for me to understand, and offered future tips to stay on top of upcoming issues that could be anticipated. Thank you to her for helping to put my mind at ease during very challenging and difficult times.
